.languagepicker.LanguagePickerActivity: The activity facilitates user interactions: search contacts, access menus, translate text, download offline files, cancel actions, and confirm decisions.
.TranslateActivity: The activity facilitates translation and navigation:Search, menu, navigate, history, handwriting, options, text entry, paste, language swap, and settings management for user interaction and feedback.
com.google.android.apps.lens.MainActivit: The activity facilitates user interaction: search contacts, enable camera flash, access options, select gallery image, use camera for search, and expand translation choices.
com.google.android.apps.translate.pref.S: The setting of 'Tap to Translate','Data usage','keyboard','voice region','voice speed','voice speech input'.
